elements.name: Action Points
elements.description: Players have a limited number of points to perform actions each turn.

elements.name: Simultaneous Action Selection
elements.description: Players secretly select and reveal actions at the same time.

elements.name: Card Play / Deck Building
elements.description: Cards represent resources, actions, or events. Players build a deck over time and draw cards to execute strategies.
requirements: Rules for deck composition and usage.

elements.name: Hand Management
elements.description: Players manage a limited number of cards to maximize efficiency.

elements.name: Dice Rolling
elements.description: Used for movement, combat, or random events.
requirements: Define outcomes for each face of the dice.
Balance between randomness and player agency.

elements.name: Hidden Roles
elements.description: Players have secret objectives or affiliations.
requirements: Role distribution and victory conditions for each role.
Mechanics for revealing or deducing roles.

elements.name: Negotiation
elements.description: Players form temporary alliances or trade resources.

elements.name: Tech Trees / Tracks
elements.description: Players unlock abilities or upgrades over time.

elements.name: Legacy Mechanics
elements.description: Persistent changes to the game state between sessions.

elements.name: Worker Placement
elements.description: Assign workers to tasks or areas for resources.

elements.name: Area Control / Majority
elements.description: Compete for dominance in specific regions.
